flawed_nl_solution:
Bucket B has 3 more fruits than C (which has 9 fruits) for a total of 9+3 = <<3+9=16>>16 fruits
Bucket A has 4 more fruits than B (which has 16 fruits) for a total of 16+4 = <<4+16=20>>20 fruits
All three buckets have a total of 9+16+20 = <<9+16+20=45>>45 fruits

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 12, not 16. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
